rooms.description: Modern open-plan living space with ample natural light via floor-to-ceiling glass windows. Vastu principles ensure the entrance faces north for auspicious energy.
Fully equipped kitchen with smart appliances and an island counter. Designed to promote good flow of chi with clear sightlines from the main living area.
Integrated dining space that opens into the lounge for a fluid entertaining zone.
Dedicated workspace with soundproofing and abundant natural light. Placed in the northeast to boost creativity and productivity as per Vastu guidelines.
Compact, functional living space for domestic help. Includes a small kitchenette and storage, located away from the main activity zone.

openings.description: Large entry door aligned with Vastu principles ensuring positive energy flow.
Balanced openings to ensure ample natural light and ventilation throughout the space.
Sleek balcony providing outdoor space and extra sunlight, aligned with Vastu to enhance relaxation.
